language-data.name: English
language-data.locale: en, en_US, en_AU, en_CA, en_GB, en_IE, en_NZ

title: Create Administrator Account
subtitle: Welcome! Please create your administrator account to get started.
username_invalid: Username can only contain letters, numbers, underscores and hyphens
password_too_short: Password must be at least 8 characters long
password_weak: Password must contain at least one letter and one number
init_success: System initialized successfully! Redirecting to login...
create_failed: Failed to create user file, please check directory permissions.
tip_username: Username will be used to login to the admin panel
tip_password: Use a strong password with letters, numbers and special characters
tip_save_credentials: Please save your login credentials securely
